resources.string: This is a ShowCase View, it is often used to highlight important features of an application for the user.
This is a toast. A small message on the screen that will give the user a message.
This is a Alert. It will interrupt all action on the screen. Until a user takes action from the alert.
Pull down from the top of your screen to see the notification.
So glad I could help. Please use this anytime you would like!
So sorry I will strive to do better next time.
